amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to studying and providing for tax equivalency under the payments in lieu of taxes program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3141 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 349.

action.text: Amendment SA 3141 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S6231-6232; text: CR S6231) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to studying and providing for tax equivalency under the payments in lieu of taxes program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3141 proposed by Senator Lee.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3141 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 349.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3141 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 349.
